sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.EmailAccountSecurity</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>EmailAccountSecurity</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var EmailAccountSecurity = Class.create();
EmailAccountSecurity.prototype = {
	migrate: function(/* GlideRecord */ gr) {
		if (!(gr instanceof GlideRecord)) {
			gs.error(this.type + ': expected a GlideRecord');
			return;
		}
		
		if (gr.getTableName() != 'sys_email_account') {
			gs.error(this.type + ': incorrect GlideRecord, expected sys_email_account, given ' + gr.getTableName());
			return;
		}
		
		if (!gr.isValid()) {
			gs.error(this.type + ': invalid GlideRecord given');
			return;
		}
		
		if (gr.getValue('enable_ssl') == 1) {
			gr.setValue('connection_security', 'ssl');
		} else if (gr.getValue('enable_tls') == 1) {
			gr.setValue('connection_security', 'starttls');
		} else {
			gr.setValue('connection_security', 'none');
		}
    },

    type: 'EmailAccountSecurity'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2018-09-11 17:05:14</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>620a262c572023007f004758ef94f902</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>EmailAccountSecurity</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Email Accounts" source="com.glide.email_accounts">d071c5cf6d2620100acb70b35343304a</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_620a262c572023007f004758ef94f902</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2018-09-13 20:48:41</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>792</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
